metadata.title: CVE-2021-40566 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A Segmentation fault casued by heap use after free vulnerability exists in Gpac through 1.0.1 via the mpgviddmx_process function in reframe_mpgvid.c when using mp4box, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
